channel.title: eSports Team Logo
channel.description:
Alright you sons of bitches. Probably don't know me in this board, I'm never in it.
I run a sponsored CS:GO team who have just recently dropped the organisation (Exclusion Gaming) that had signed our team. We're now back to a solo sponsor and are in need of a logo. With the name of the team being Draconis it'd be pretty good to include a dragon and shit. Just a generic eSports logo.
Literally generic eSports logo. - Some kind of shield/shape behind it lookin kinda 3d ish - The Dragon popping its head out of the shape as though it's saying hello - The name of the team on some type of banner or some shit below that - Basically if you've never seen an eSports team logo this is what they all look like - http://fc05.deviantart.net/fs70/f/2013/131/b/1/diversion_esports_logo_by_crofresh-d62j5dw.jpg
If it's just fun and you want to be nice to me then do it for free by all means.
If you can't do it I'll just learn the basics of Photoshop and do it myself but it seemed easier posting here first since all you guys enjoy this kinda stuff.
Give me a shout here or PM me for my steam and we can discuss it more if you think it needs to be discussed.
Cheers boys.

item.title: eSports Team Logo
item.dc:creator: @iCreatedHorror Ryan
item.description:
@iCreatedHorror wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:10, topic:549438”][quote author=stCky link=topic=668341.msg4470087#msg4470087 date=1422491226]
I think I might have to start playing with Americans, by the game being dead I meant the local/national scene for my country btw
[/quote]
Depends what your country is I guess :). American CS just took a big hit there by match fixing scandals for betting. Pretty stupid IMO but you should read up on that if you’re gonna start playing again, just so you can be armed with the jokes for all your yank friends.[/quote]just browse the cs:go reddit and you’ll be good to go with jokes and all.

Read full topic

item.title: eSports Team Logo
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“stCky, post:7, topic:549438”]My reply from my man Royds:

“Nah man cs is dead I haven’t played since 2012 so stopped doing logos, I still do freelance gfx design for insert ridiculous rate here”

I tried (y) CS:S died long ago here I’m afraid We only have a couple of nationwide LANs per year, CS:GO didn’t even get to take off properly cause of how dead it is here :([/quote]
Thanks for asking mate.

Source is dead however GO is no where near dead, it’s growing at incredible rates. Over 500k viewers at the last major and with MLG just joining the tournament pool with a 700k prize pool tournament cs is still very much at large. The game’s rapidly growing even larger than it was, I’m sure there’s something like half a million unique players per week.

Read full topic

item.title: eSports Team Logo

item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

Alright you sons of bitches. Probably don’t know me in this board, I’m never in it.

I run a sponsored CS:GO team who have just recently dropped the organisation (Exclusion Gaming) that had signed our team. We’re now back to a solo sponsor and are in need of a logo. With the name of the team being Draconis it’d be pretty good to include a dragon and shit. Just a generic eSports logo.

Literally generic eSports logo.

  • Some kind of shield/shape behind it lookin kinda 3d ish
  • The Dragon popping its head out of the shape as though it’s saying hello
  • The name of the team on some type of banner or some shit below that
  • Basically if you’ve never seen an eSports team logo this is what they all look like - http://fc05.deviantart.net/fs70/f/2013/131/b/1/diversion_esports_logo_by_crofresh-d62j5dw.jpg

If it’s just fun and you want to be nice to me then do it for free by all means.

If you can’t do it I’ll just learn the basics of Photoshop and do it myself but it seemed easier posting here first since all you guys enjoy this kinda stuff.

Give me a shout here or PM me for my steam and we can discuss it more if you think it needs to be discussed.

Cheers boys.
